summary: Sarah is loud, non-conform, rude, honest and provocative. She seems invincible, but she is lonely and lost. Struggling with her daily life.
cast: Lilli Meinhardt|Christian Ehrich|Peter Trabner|Eva Bay|Axel Ranisch|David Brizzi|Gabriele Domschke|Italo De Angelis
keywords: father daughter relationship|mother daughter relationship|loneliness|seeking love|student
title: Liebe mich!
